scripts.build:prod:darwin: rimraf dist && pnpm setup:env make build-all
scripts.build:prod:linux: rimraf dist && pnpm setup:env make build-all
scripts.build:prod:win32: rimraf dist && pnpm setup:env:win32 make build-all
scripts.go:test: rimraf dist-tests && mkdir dist-tests && go test -v ./... 2>&1 | tee ./dist-tests/go-test-output.txt
scripts.setup:env: cross-env QUARKUS_PLATFORM_GROUP_ID=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.quarkusPlatformGroupId) QUARKUS_VERSION=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.quarkusVersion) PLUGIN_VERSION=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.version)
scripts.setup:env:win32: pnpm powershell "cross-env QUARKUS_PLATFORM_GROUP_ID=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.quarkusPlatformGroupId) QUARKUS_VERSION=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.quarkusVersion) PLUGIN_VERSION=$(build-env knPluginWorkflow.version)"
